paragraph: "1-800-BOATLAW" is the CTA which usually phrases like 'to call or text the contact number for a consultation'.
valueProp:
Dedicated Maritime Attorneys
Maritime lawyers Douglas Williams and Nick Neidzwski at BoatLaw, LLP have worked hard for decades on behalf of clients injured aboard ships of all sizes and classes. Formed in 1977, this firm is proud of its consistent track record of success for its clients for over 45 years. At BoatLaw, LLP, you will find a legal team, including each of the attorneys, that share a lifelong love of the sea.
